message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value it holds for you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $900,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $950,000.  This reflects the value of the product for you, while still allowing me to get a fair price.  What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $950,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $920,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the value I can get from it.
